actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV, XI, and XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the Federal matching rate for purposes of reimbursement to States under the programs of aid to needy families with children and medical assistance.
short_title: Uniform Federal Welfare and Medicaid Assistance Act
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Uniform Federal Welfare and Medicaid Assistance Act - Increases to 75 percent the Federal matching rate for purposes of reimbursement to States under the Medicaid and Aid to Families with Dependent Children programs of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: Uniform Federal Welfare and Medicaid Assistance Act

A bill to amend title IV, XI, and XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the Federal matching rate for purposes of reimbursement to States under the programs of aid to needy families with children and medical assistance.
